data.text: Woe to them that devise iniquity, and work evil upon their beds!
And they covet fields, and take them by violence;
In that day shall one take up a parable against you,
Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot
Prophesy ye not, say they to them that prophesy:
O thou that art named the house of Jacob,
Even of late my people is risen up as an enemy:
The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses;
Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest:
If a man walking in the spirit and falsehood do lie, saying,
I will surely assemble, O Jacob, all of thee;
The breaker is come up before them:
